content:
https://github.com/the-commons-project/vci-directory/pull/28

Does this mean that the state of NY will be issuing SHCs?

Paul Denning said:

https://github.com/the-commons-project/vci-directory/pull/28

Does this mean that the state of NY will be issuing SHCs?

it does! currently the NY program is in a soft launch/ transition period, but as of today SHCs are available via the website under the Excelsior Pass Plus option: https://epass.ny.gov/home
Wow, awesome. Their FAQ calls out SHC/VCI specifically!
